thread.section_title: Lyft Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Lyft | www.lyft.com | 8 of 104
thread.title: Amparo Young

author: Amparo Young
title: Amparo Young
text: Lyft driver did not follow GPS map and missed my exit taking me out of my way in time and distance a ride which I had been doing with Uber all week twice a day which runs for 13 to 16 dollars turned out to be almost 27 dollars with Lyft. Consumers beware!!! Had trouble downloading app, using discount card, and setting up my future rides with Lyft. Ironically this is actually my blessing. Stuck with Uber!!!
